node.title: Suspect named in Brooklyn subway shooting as manhunt continues
node.description: Ten people were shot and another 13 injured in the attack on a subway train Tuesday morning.
node.content: ["A man who was previously considered a \"person of interest\" in Tuesday's\u00a0subway shooting in Brooklyn, New York, is now considered the suspect in\u00a0the rampage, Mayor Eric Adams said Wednesday morning. Police have been looking for Frank James, 62, since tying a U-Haul van he rented to the shooting.", "Ten people were shot and wounded in the attack, and over a dozen more suffered other injuries.", "The NYPD tweeted: \"Frank Robert James fired numerous gun shots inside an 'N' line subway car at 36th St & 4th Ave subway station causing serious injuries to 10 people. Anyone with info about the incident or his whereabouts should contact\u00a0@NYPDTips\u00a0or call 1-800-577-TIPS.\"", "On 4/12/22 at 8:30 AM, Frank Robert James fired numerous gun shots inside an \"N\" line subway car at 36th St & 4th Ave subway station causing serious injuries to 10 people. Anyone with info about the incident or his whereabouts should contact @NYPDTips or call 1-800-577-TIPS. pic.twitter.com/MaeF16i4bX", "This is a developing story and will be updated."]
